welcome_message_body: Welcome to Kappeln, Germany! Known for its picturesque harbor, charming streets, and friendly locals, we invite you to explore and experience the beauty of this coastal city. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Sonderborg Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the terminal building.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kiel-Holtenau Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Kiel-Holtenau Airport, handling all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Schleswig-jagel Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Schaferhaus Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Schaferhaus Airport, mainly used for low-cost carriers and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
